snippet: Mr. Robinson, who retired from the game at 29, later became an official with the N.F.L. Players Association.
abstract: Stacy Robinson, receiver who won two Super Bowls with the New York Giants, dies at age 50.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Robinson, who retired from the game at 29, later became an official with the N.F.L. Players Association.

headline.seo: Stacy Robinson, Giants Receiver in the ’80s, Dies at 50
headline.main: Stacy Robinson, Wide Receiver on Giants’ Super Bowl Teams, Dies at 50
headline.print_headline: Stacy Robinson, 50, Receiver on Two Super Bowl-Winning Teams for Giants
